com.k2.Html5Builder.MediaQueryBuilder

Class MediaQueryGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Html5Builder.MediaQueryBuilder.MediaQuery
      • com.k2.Html5Builder.MediaQueryBuilder.MediaQueryGroup

  • public class MediaQueryGroup
extends MediaQuery
    This class repreents a group of media queries. A media query group is also a media query and all media queries in a group are anded together Media query groups can define a chain of media query groups. Chains of media query groups are ored together Each member of a chain of media query groups includes a pointer to the first group in the chain and a pointer to the next group in the chain Since a MediaQueryGroup extends MediaQuery media query groups can contain other media query groups if such groups are also a chain then all queries in the chain are treated as a single query within the containing group Media query groups can be negated in which case all queries in the group are negated
    Author:
    simon

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) MediaQueryGroup firstGroup
      The first group on the chain or this group if it is the first in the chain
      (package private) MediaQueryGroup orGroup
      The next group in the chain if there is one
